title: Getting more refunds...
body:
I understand if this isn't possible and whatnot but hear me out, **would it be possible for at-least one refund to be given each season (Cap of 3)**, Players like myself who have been playing for a while who have used all of their refunds for silly reasons may understand how I feel... Some people may say something along the lines of "oh you shouldn't have wasted them" or " that's why we only get three use them wisely", I agree though I regret using mine the way I did. 

Thanks for any feedback and or opinions!{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
I used all mine before I was level 20, though I have to admit we should get more refunds every Season, but what Riot should do is you get your RP back, they keep the money but you lose the thing you bought. Maybe 3 every season, at a cap of 3, but you can only refund things you bought that season.

So Riot doesn't lose any many but if you have a garbage skin that you bought THAT season, you can trade it for something else.

I thought we get 3 refunds every season so i used up all of mine. Riot should give us 3 refunds per year. It's not like they are gonna lose out on anything as sooner or later we are gonna use it to buy something from their store eitherway.

let's just do some basic math.

Let's say 1,000 players really want that new legendary skin, they have 3 skins they could refund for the amount they need.

that's 1820 RP, x 1000 | ie. 1,820,000 RP
/ 12100 RP ($100 (purely for AUD pricing)) = 150
150 x $100 = $15,000.

Now imagine if EVERYONE got 3 resets per year. That's a potential hundreds of thousands of dollars of loss of profit per year.
It doesn't matter if a few players that don't regularly spend and/or can't afford a new skin, what matters is their regular paying customers, that's what keeps them afloat.
